docs.lead_paragraph: COLUMBUS, Ohio, April 6 Dr. Samuel H. Sheppard, who was convicted in a controversial trial of the slaying of his first wife and then acquitted after nearly 10 years in prison, died here early this morning. He was 46 years old.

headline.main: Dr. Samuel Sheppard, 46, Dies; Imprisoned for Wife's Murder; Osteopath Freed in 2d Trial Court Said Publicity Barred Fair Hearing

docs.abstract: Sheppard imprisoned 10 yrs for murder and then acquitted, dies, 46, Columbus
docs.snippet: COLUMBUS, Ohio, April 6 Dr. Samuel H. Sheppard, who was convicted in a controversial trial of the slaying of his first wife and then acquitted after nearly 10 years in prison, died here early this morning. He was 46 years old.
